tz.help: This field is used in order to define in which timezone the resources will work.
tz.name: tz

activity_state.help:
Status based on activities
Overdue: Due date is already passed
Today: Activity date is today
Planned: Future activities.
activity_state.name: activity_state

activity_exception_decoration.help: Type of the exception activity on record.
activity_exception_decoration.name: activity_exception_decoration

activity_exception_icon.help: Icon to indicate an exception activity.
activity_exception_icon.name: activity_exception_icon

message_unread.help: If checked, new messages require your attention.
message_unread.name: message_unread

message_needaction.help: If checked, new messages require your attention.
message_needaction.name: message_needaction

message_needaction_counter.help: Number of messages which requires an action
message_needaction_counter.name: message_needaction_counter

message_has_error.help: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.
message_has_error.name: message_has_error

message_has_error_counter.help: Number of messages with delivery error
message_has_error_counter.name: message_has_error_counter

message_has_sms_error.help: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.
message_has_sms_error.name: message_has_sms_error

active.help: If the active field is set to False, it will allow you to hide the resource record without removing it.
active.name: active

member_of_department.help: Whether the employee is a member of the active user's department or one of it's child department.
member_of_department.name: member_of_department

user_id.help: Related user name for the resource to manage its access.
user_id.name: user_id

coach_id.help:
Select the "Employee" who is the coach of this employee.
The "Coach" has no specific rights or responsibilities by default.
coach_id.name: coach_id

employee_type.help: The employee type. Although the primary purpose may seem to categorize employees, this field has also an impact in the Contract History. Only Employee type is supposed to be under contract and will have a Contract History.
employee_type.name: employee_type

company_country_code.help:
The ISO country code in two chars. 
You can use this field for quick search.
company_country_code.name: company_country_code

address_home_id.help: Enter here the private address of the employee, not the one linked to your company.
address_home_id.name: address_home_id

is_address_home_a_company.string: The employee address has a company linked
is_address_home_a_company.name: is_address_home_a_company

lang.help: All the emails and documents sent to this contact will be translated in this language.
lang.name: lang

pin.help: PIN used to Check In/Out in the Kiosk Mode of the Attendance application (if enabled in Configuration) and to change the cashier in the Point of Sale application.
pin.name: pin

attendance_ids.help: list of attendances for the employee
attendance_ids.name: attendance_ids
